Class DefaultExciteStrategy

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
Initializable, ExciteStrategy, Strategy, java.io.Serializable
public class DefaultExciteStrategy
extends StrategyImpl
implements ExciteStrategy

Basic ExciteStrategy governed by a linear curve. WARNING: Renaming this class requires renaming values in configs/factoriesData.xml
